vlive.korean: [Q.] 힐링이 제일 필요할 때는? [Q] When do you need rest most? 듣기 View video OSEN : Golden Child 골든차일드가 힐링이 제일 필요할 때는? #스타로드 09
vlive.english: [Q] When do you need rest most?

vlive.korean: 필요할 때 운동하는 것 같은 느낌? They work out when they need it? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 28 🦊
vlive.english: They work out when they need it?

vlive.korean: 얘 그거 필요할 것 같은데 - 어떤 거? I think he needs the thing. - Which one? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] NU'NIVERSITY : 타자의 이해와 실습
vlive.english: I think he needs the thing. - Which one?

vlive.korean: 응 그거 필요할 것 같아 근데 이거 먼저 붙이고... - 뭐 어떤 솔? Oh, okay. I'm going to need that. But I'm going to put this... - Which one? 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 꾸며봅시당🖤
vlive.english: Oh, okay. I'm going to need that. But I'm going to put this... - Which one?

vlive.korean: 힐링이 제일 필요할 때? When I need healing most? 듣기 View video OSEN : WINNER 송민호, 못하는 게 없는 MINO #스타로드 하이라이트

examples.korean: Children should be disciplined when the need arises. 발음듣기 아이들은 필요할 때마다 훈육을 해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Children should be disciplined when the need arises. 발음

examples.korean: The committee will need time to assimilate this report. 발음듣기 위원회가 이 보고서를 소화하려면 시간이 필요할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The committee will need time to assimilate this report. 발음

examples.korean: You can preset the radiators to come on when you need them to. 발음듣기 필요할 때 난방기가 가동되도록 미리 조정해 놓을 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can preset the radiators to come on when you need them to. 발음

examples.korean: We’ll need about 20 chairs, I should think. 발음듣기 우리가 의자가 20개쯤 필요할 거야, 아마 틀림없이. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ll need about 20 chairs, I should think. 발음

examples.korean: You need the services of a good lawyer. 발음듣기 당신은 훌륭한 변호사의 도움이 필요할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You need the services of a good lawyer. 발음
